title: Oral Storytelling Entity (ORSEN)
desc: Funded by the government of the Philippines. This project enables collaborative storytelling between chatbots and children. I built features that allowed ORSEN to learn new vocabulary from the user and use this information to create engaging interactions. My contributions improved the affect score by 13.7% and the children's overall enjoyment by 14.6%.
